title: Donald Trump and the Fall of the Republican Party
description:
Donald Trump and the Fall of the Republican Party:

We have 36 titles here:

-  50 GOP Officials Warn Donald Trump Would Put Nationâ€™s Security â€˜at Riskâ€™ (Aug 8, 2016)

-  Barrett - Trump; the Greatest Show on Earth; the Deals, the Downfall, the Reinvention (2016)

-  Blum - The Psychopathology of Donald Trump, (Truthdig, Jul 31, 2016)

-  Blumenthal - Republican Gomorrah; Inside the Movement That Shattered the Party (2009)

-  Brennan - Turning Right in the Sixties; the Conservative Capture of the GOP (1995)

-  Brock - Blinded by the Right; the Conscience of an Ex-Conservative (2002)

-  Burrell - Republican Treason; Republican Fascism Exposed (2008)

-  Conner - Wrapped in the Flag; a Personal History of America's Radical Right (2013)

-  Constantine (Ed.) - The Essential Mae Brussell; Investigations of Fascism in America (2014)

-  Coppins - The Wilderness; Deep Inside the Republican Party's Combative, Contentious, Chaotic Quest to Take Back the White House (2015)

-  Critchlow - The Conservative Ascendancy; How the GOP Right Made Political History (2007)

-  Crowley - Trump's Nuclear Nightmare (POLITICO, Aug 3, 2016)

-  Dean - Conservatives without Conscience (2006)

-  Dionne - Why the Right Went Wrong; Conservatism from Goldwater to the Tea Party and Beyond (2016)

-  Donald Trump Voter Guide; Who is Donald Trump (Feb 1, 2016)

-  Flanders (Ed.) - At the Tea Party; the Wing Nuts, Whack Jobs and Whitey-Whiteness of the New Republican Right (2010)

-  Iyer - We Too Sing America; South Asian, Arab, Muslim, and Sikh Immigrants Shape Our Multiracial Future (2015)

-  James - Assholes; a Theory of Donald Trump (2016)

-  Johnston - The Making of Donald Trump (2016)

-  Kabaservice - Rule and Ruin; the Downfall of Moderation and the Destruction of the Republican Party, from Eisenhower to the Tea Party (2012)

-  Lewis - Too Dumb to Fail; How the GOP Betrayed the Reagan Revolution to Win Elections.. (2016)

-  Malone - The End of a Republican Party; Racial and Cultural Resentment Have Replaced the Party's Small Government Ethos (FiveThirtyEight, Jul 18, 2016)

-  Mann & Ornstein - It's Even Worse than It Looks; How the American Constitutional System Collided with the New Politics of Extremism (2012)

-  Miller - The End of Greatness; Why America Can't Have (and Doesn't Want) Another Great President (2014)

-  Noonan - The Week They Decided He Was Crazy; Trump Inflicts One Wound After Another on His Campaign (WSJ, Aug 4, 2016)

-  Parker & Barreto - Change They Can't Believe In; the Tea Party and Reactionary Politics in America (2013)

-  Rank - American History & Donald Trump; a History Professor Explores the 200-Year-Old Roots of the Trump Campaign (2016)

-  Shapiro - Trump This! The Life and Times of Donald Trump; an Unauthorized Biography (2016)

-  Singer - Trump and Me (2016)

-  Smith - Conservatism and Racism, and Why in America They Are the Same (2010)

-  Stewart - Donald Trump; the Top Reasons He Must Not Win the 2016 Presidential Election (2016)

-  'The Art of the Bad Deal', Newsweek (August 12, 2016)

-  Thompson (Ed.) - Confronting the New Conservatism; the Rise of the Right in America (2007)

-  Trump; the Good, the Bad & the Quotable, Beyon Books Editors (2015)

-  Whitman - It's My Party Too; the Battle for the Heart of the GOP and the Future of America (2005)
